items.title: Intro to the Low-code framework & Citizen Developer given by `mbake` example
items.summary: Technology is ready, so you should be too!
items.content_text: A citizen developer is a non-professional developer who builds applications for use by other people. Although they do not report directly to IT, they use tools such as low-code platforms that are sanctioned by IT.

items.title: Handle multiple development environments with mbake and pug as easy as ride a bike
items.summary: Setting development environment is always takes time, but it can be quick and easy without the extra hassle with mbake and pug.
items.content_text: Mbake is a tool that helps develop an app as quickly as possible, in conjunction with pug, scss, ts    and livereload it makes setup of the app in seconds, no need for learning the new framework in order 	to build the project. Mbake build with vanilla JS, that makes extending it pretty simple.
